work.name: BetterVet
work.summary: As one of the first six engineers, I contributed significantly to scaling the company from 5,000 to 500,000 users and growing the team to 200+ employees. My work spanned full-stack development, system optimization, and feature delivery.
highlights: Designed and implemented a user-friendly mobile app for clients and veterinarians, improving engagement and appointment bookings.
Migrated deployment from AWS EC2 to ECS, ensuring scalability and minimizing downtime.
Created an incentivized referral program that rewarded clients for referring friends, boosting retention rates and loyalty.
Developed a custom scheduling system solution reducing no-shows and improving operational efficiency.
Integrated SquareUp as the new payments API replacement for Gravity, maintaining both third party APIs using design patterns.
Regularly updated codebases to ensure compatibility with new features and security patches.

work.name: Technisys
work.summary: At Technisys, I was part of a 14-member development team dedicated to enhancing the digital experience for Diners Club from Ecuador. During my 9-month tenure, I played a key role in modernizing the frontend architecture and optimizing the performance of both web and mobile applications.
highlights: Developed and maintained user interfaces for web and mobile applications using React and React Native, collaborating closely with a 14-member team to deliver a seamless user experience.
Implemented advanced state management solutions utilizing Redux Thunk and Redux Sagas to improve application efficiency and maintainability.
Styled components using Sass and Stylesheets, following design specifications, and set up Storybook for consistent UI documentation and testing.
Collaborated with QA team to deliver high-quality code faster using Jest for unit testing.

work.name: Orbit
work.summary: I worked on a variety of projects over a 7-month period, contributing to different fields and quickly adapting to diverse requirements. The projects ranged from language learning applications to delivery services and emergency alert systems.
highlights: Developed and maintained mobile applications using React Native across multiple projects, ensuring functionality and a user-friendly interface.
Built backend services with Nest.js and TypeORM for data management and server-side logic in select projects.
Implemented features and integrations such as Google Maps API, form validation with Formik and Yup, and state management with Redux Thunk.
Adapted quickly to diverse project needs, delivering quality results for each application in a short time frame.

work.name: Onready
work.summary: Worked in a software factory environment, collaborating with cross-functional teams using agile methodologies, specifically Scrum, to deliver high-quality software solutions. My responsibilities included developing and maintaining both backend and frontend applications, ensuring alignment with client requirements, and deploying scalable solutions.
highlights: Developed a Magento multivendor plugin (PHP)
Built a REST API (Node.js) to integrate ePak (OCA) services with the VTEX platform.
Created a REST API (Node.js) to manage user balances for the PayGoal wallet, deployed on AWS.
Developed a web app to interact with the VTEX API (React).
Built a mobile wallet app for PayGoal's client (React Native).
Created a web app for managing PayGoal's wallet clients (React Native).
Designed the interface for the Magento plugin (jQuery, HTML and CSS).

references.name: Matthew Harris, CTO (BetterVet)
references.reference: “I had the pleasure of working with Ignacio, who grew from a developer into a highly skilled senior engineer. His dedication, strong coding practices, and willingness to mentor others made a significant impact on the team. I highly recommend him for any opportunity.”

references.name: Nahuel Schlegel, Backend & Infrastructure Engineering Manager (BetterVet)
references.reference: “Ignacio is a great developer! He manages projects independently from the beginning to launch. He resolves everything; if he doesn't know something, he researches, asks, and solves it. He has been one pillar for BetterVet, working on multiple projects side by side with the team. He is very proactive, self-taught, and a very good teammate.”

projects.name: Lexikon
projects.description: Greek Language Learning App: Developed the backend using Nest.js and TypeORM, and built a mobile app with React Native for interactive language learning.

projects.name: Tiendas Tic
projects.description: Product Delivery App: Implemented features including Google Maps integration, and used React Native Paper for UI components, while handling form management with Formik and Yup.

projects.name: Helpy
projects.description: Emergency Alert App: Created an application to help elderly or disabled users alert their relatives in emergencies, using React Native, Formik, Yup, and Redux Thunk for robust form handling and state management.

projects.name: Veterinarian Admin Panel
projects.description: Led the migration of legacy software to a modern architecture using the tRPC framework. The project involved transitioning outdated systems to a new, more scalable solution, while ensuring data integrity.
